details.title: Engineering People Lead and Full-Stack Software Engineer
details.pitch: Proven, commercial experience delivering accessible, quality web applications
details.description_html:
Hi, I'm Nick. I'm a Software Engineer from New Zealand living in Washington, D.C.

I specialize in building applications using web technologies. With proven, commercial experience delivering high-quality applications for many clients around the world.

These include Air New Zealand, DB Cargo, Jade Software Corporation, and Skipton Building Society.

Check out some of my projects for a little taste of what I can do.

metadata.title: Nick Leslie - Software Engineer
metadata.description: Nick Leslie is a Software Engineer in Washington, DC. These are his personal projects, work history and résumé. Maybe a blog post or two
